titleStmt.title: Die Veneris 5⁰. Maij. 1643. It is this day ordered by the Lords and Commons in Parliament, that the booke concerning the enjoyning and tollerating of sports upon the Lords day, be forthwith burned ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Underhill in Great Woodstreete,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
An ordinance for burning a book of sports by the hand of the common hangman.
Order signed: John Browne Cler Parl. and Henry Elsynge Cler. P. D. Com.; agreement to order signed: Iohn Langham, Thomas Andrewes.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
